input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Thermal Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT c2 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTO Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Peter Sagan Supergiara woman W Bibshort'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Bib Short III Men's Print Pack'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Evo Premio Bib Shorts'
  - Name='ASSOS MILLE GTC KIESPANZER Bib Shorts C2'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Bib Shorts C2'
  - Name='Man Sportful Giara 2 bibshort'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Shorts'
  - Name='Rapha Ef Education First Pro Team Short Slv Cycling Kit'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts II'
  - Name='Pactimo Women's Ascent Vector Pro Cycling Bibs'
  - Name='Rapha - Women's Pro Team Cycling Bib Shorts - Regular - Black/Black - Large'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Vintage Italy Padded Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Merino Wool Cycling Base Layer'
  - Name='Woman Endura FS260 II'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Thermal Cycling 3/4 Bib Tights'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Core Foam Bib'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Bib'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's bibshort product similar in function and design to the Pedal Mafia Pro Delta Bib, focusing on comfort and performance cycling bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Classic Thermal Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cycling bibshort, but thermal design suggests different intended use (colder weather), slightly less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT c2 Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality men's bibshorts designed for performance cycling, closely aligned in function and product type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTO Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another performance bibshort from Assos, closely matching the reference product's category and features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Peter Sagan Supergiara woman W Bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's bibshort designed for high performance, similar function but female-specific design lowers relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Bib Short III Men's Print Pack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's pro-level bibshort comparable in construction and purpose to Pedal Mafia's pro bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Evo Premio Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end men's bibshort for cycling, similar technical features and performance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS MILLE GTC KIESPANZER Bib Shorts C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling bibshort, but GTC Kiespanzer may indicate a slightly different fit or style, still highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Uma Gt Bib Shorts C2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed for women, technical bibshort with similar purpose but less direct match due to gender-specific design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Sportful Giara 2 bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling bibshort with performance intent, comparable though brand and model less premium than reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General men's cycling bibshort from Rapha, similar category and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Core Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts rather than bibshorts, similar cycling use but differs in silhouette and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Ef Education First Pro Team Short Slv Cycling Kit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Refers to a shorts sleeve or kit component, not a bibshort product, thus low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Bib Shorts II
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's professional cycling bibshort with features and purpose very close to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Women's Ascent Vector Pro Cycling Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's pro cycling bibs, similar use but female cut reduces direct relevancy to reference men's bibshort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha - Women's Pro Team Cycling Bib Shorts - Regular - Black/Black - Large
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's pro bibshorts, comparable product category but gender difference lowers relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Vintage Italy Padded Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's padded bibshort from pro-level team collection, highly similar to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Merino Wool Cycling Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer garment, not a bibshort, different product class and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Woman Endura FS260 II
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a women's cycling garment but lacks 'bibshort' specificity; FS260 II may be shorts or tights, less specific overlap.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Thermal Cycling 3/4 Bib Tights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal 3/4 tights versus full-length bibshorts; related cycling apparel but different style and seasonality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Core Foam Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's bibshort from the same brand, related product but likely less premium or different features than Pro Delta.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Bib
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's pro bibshort from the same brand, similar performance type but gender difference reduces relevancy.
